description: Application to vary the wording of condition 2 (approved drawings) and condition 16 (renewable energy) of planning permission ref P071047, dated 7 December 2007 for the: ‘Change of use of the existing building and the erection of a roof extension to provide for student accommodation (45 rooms) and the retention of B1 (office) floor space, and associated works.’
